channel.title: Support Reworks
channel.description:
[Main Thread](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/master-rework-of-doom/47102)
Support Reworks:
> **[color=blue]Physician (Blue Dragon Support)[/color]** > > Passive: Remedy Studies: You are immune to poison and bleeding. > > Night Ability: Heal > > Day Ability: Inoculate: Make a player immune to bleeding and poison for the rest of the game. 1 use.
> **[color=blue]Court Wizard (Blue Dragon Support)[/color]** > > Passive: Fragile Magic: If you would be redirected while using Tornado, you will be occupied instead. > > Night Ability: Tornado: Bypasses redirection immunity, infinite uses. > > Night Ability: Magic Barrier: Same.
> **[color=purple]Sage (Unseen Support)[/color]** > > Passive: Fragile Magic: If you would be redirected while using Tornado, you will be occupied instead. > > Night Ability: Tornado: Bypasses redirection immunity, infinite uses. If any other class tries to swap them, you all will fail. > > Night Ability: Wall of Fire: Same.
> **[color=blue]Squire (Blue Dragon Support)[/color]** > > Passive: Excitable: Cannot die until someone else has died. > > Night Ability: Promotion: Take the class of a dead non unique Blue Dragon. Unlimited uses.
> **[color=purple]Page (Unseen Support)[/color]** > > Passive: Excitable: Cannot die until someone else has died. > > Night Ability: Promotion: Take the converted class of a dead non unique Blue Dragon. Unlimited uses.
> **[color=blue]Baron (Blue Dragon Support)[/color]** > > Passive: Royal Blood > > Night Ability: If your target doesn't have Royal Blood, give them Royal Blood. 2 uses. > > Night Ability: Royal Loan: If your target uses a limited use ability, a charge will not be spent. > > Not included for both Baron and Duke: > Prince’s Execute if Prince killed Blue Dragon > Reanimate (In whatever form)
> **[color=purple]Duke (Unseen Support)[/color]** > > Passive: Royal Blood > > Day Ability: Coup: The Assassin's attack will bypass healing and immunity tonight. 1 use. > > Night Ability: Kinship: If your target doesn't have Royal Blood, give them Royal Blood. 2 uses. > > Night Ability: Royal Loan: If your target uses a limited use ability, a charge will not be spent. > > Not included for both Baron and Duke: > Prince’s Execute if Prince killed Blue Dragon > Reanimate (In whatever form)
> **[color=red]Ritualist (Cult Support)[/color]** > > Passive: Will of Mithras: Sacrificing you will give the cult leader 3 uses of eradicate instead of 2. > > Passive: Fragile Magic: If you would be redirected while using Teleport, you will be occupied instead. > > Day ability: Shroud: If target player is executed today they will appear as a specified class. You will know what their real class was. 1 use. > > Night ability 1: Teleport: Swap all visitors between 2 target players. Bypasses immunity. 3 uses. If any other class tries to swap them, you all will fail. > > Night ability 2: Brotherhood: Target Cult member will appear Blue dragon to investigators tonight. 2 uses.

item.description:
Tornado should just bypass immunity normally, there’s no good reason why it shouldn’t. Having 2 magic barriers would be fine though

Nothing, it’s just considered boring.

How do we feel about a day ability that empowers their night abilities, making Tornado bypass immunity or giving you two MBs? Would be a bit more interactive I guess

If Tornado now can’t be the main power, this is my alternative.

item.title: Support Reworks
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Hey, what do you think about this CW rework:

Court Wizard

Blue Dragon Support

Passive: Fragile Magic: If you and another Court Wizard use an ability on the same person, you will both fail.

Night Ability: Tornado: Redirect everyone who targets your first target to your second. Unlimited uses, bypasses immunity.

Sage has tornado replaced, duh

Possible secondary power:

Magic Barrier: Prevent all visits to your target. 2 uses.

Read full topic

item.title: Support Reworks
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
This was my original Baron and Duke

The Baron

Blue Dragon Support

(Converts to Duke)

Passives

Royal Blood:
(Everyone should know what this is)

Entitlement:
If you become the next King, you will keep your abilities alongside the abilities of succeeding Kings. (Not Starting King)

Abilities

Royal Loan: (N) (4)
Choose another player. Any limited night ability they use tonight will not lose a charge when used.

Not included for both Baron and Duke:
Prince’s Execute if Prince killed Blue Dragon
Reanimate (In whatever form)

Kinship: (D) (2)
Choose any player and give them the Royal Blood passive if they do not have it. If that class already has two passives, they may not inherit Royal Blood.

The Duke

Unseen Support

Passives

Royal Blood:
(Everyone should know what this is)

Entitlement:
If you become the next King, you will keep your abilities when you become King alongside a succeeding King’s abilities.

Abilities

Kinship: (D) (1)
Choose any player and give them the Royal Blood passive if they do not have it. If that class already has two passives, they may not inherit Royal Blood.

Coup: (N) (1)
Make Assassin’s attack tonight bypass heal and night immunity if it targets the King.
(Not part of Entitlement passive when you become the King)

Royal Loan: (N) (3)
Choose another player. Any limited night ability they use tonight will not lose a charge when used.

It’s the “Royal” Support class, being the only Royal who wouldn’t have to give up his abilities to become King, but the other abilities are still different from a Starting King’s abilities.

Read full topic

item.title: Support Reworks
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
And @NightX, seeing that the Baron and Duke are not likely to get Entitlement as a passive (but we should still consider it because I find it an interesting and unique passive)
Can you set Kinship on both Baron and Duke to Night Abilities and set the Duke’s Coup to this?

Coup: (Day) (1) Send a guard to attack the King tonight. It will bypass night immunity and healing.

This way, Baron can also join the list of fake claimers. Oh and, people shouldn’t be able to see if they get Royal Blood until it’s time to pick a new King. This would make Baron a perfect fake-claim, almost to the level of Knight, CW, Phys, Princess, Paladin, Sheriff, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Support Reworks
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
Then would it be fair if the Observer gets Exhume as a limited Day Ability? They are the most secretive investigators anyway. If not, then we should give it to the Accomplice.

Read full topic
